mapper.sql: SELECT id, inventory_id, customer_id, user_id, unit_cost, amount, sum, time, clearing_form, handler, state FROM tb_sell_return
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_sell_return( id, inventory_id, customer_id, user_id, unit_cost, amount, sum, time, clearing_form, handler) VALUE(#{id}, #{inventoryInfo.id},#{customerInfo.id},#{user.id}, #{unitCost}, #{amount},#{sum},#{time},#{clearingForm},#{handler})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_sell_return SET inventory_id=#{inventoryInfo.id}, customer_id=#{customerInfo.id}, user_id=#{user.id}, unit_cost=#{unitCost}, amount=#{amount}, sum=#{sum}, time=#{time}, clearing_form=#{clearingForm}, handler=#{handler}, state=#{approval.content} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: WHERE id = #{id}
